sub_title: Empowering Success as an Agile Coach & Scrum Master | Transforming Teams through Collaborative & Innovative Agile Strategies
summary:
Greetings! I'm Harry, an Agile Coach/Scrum Master with over 8 years of experience helping organizations achieve their goals through agile methodologies. My passion lies in working with companies that are open to change and eager to create high-performing teams.

As an Agile Coach, I believe in working collaboratively with the leadership team to implement change throughout the organization. I've successfully led large-scale agile transformations that have brought about positive change and increased productivity. I also have experience in implementing agile methodologies in start-ups and have helped them achieve their objectives quickly and efficiently.

My approach to Agile Coaching centers around fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation. I've led several initiatives focused on building high-performing teams, which have led to improved employee morale and greater business outcomes. I've also collaborated with leadership teams to help them become more Agile in their approach to decision-making and strategy development.

I'm highly motivated and dedicated to helping organizations achieve success through Agile Coaching. If you're looking for an experienced Agile Coach who's passionate about helping companies achieve their objectives, let's connect and see how we can work together!

projects.title: RapideL E-Learning Authoring Tool
projects.description: RapideL stand for Rapid e-Learning. This project was created in VBA using VB6.0 as add-in for MS-Word. The output of the project was SCROM compliant Flash e-learning course.

projects.title: Sage Accpac ERP Implementation
projects.description: Involved in a large scale project (more than $300,000 USD) for implementation and configuration of following modules: Accounts Payable (A/P), Accounts Receivable (A/R), General Ledger (G/L), Fixed Assets (F/A), Inventory Control (I/C), Purchase Workflow (P/W), User Configuration and Management.

contributors.headline: Empowering Success as an Agile Coach & Scrum Master | Transforming Teams through Collaborative & Innovative Agile Strategies

profile_positions.description:
As an Agile Coach & Scrum Master at K3 Business Technology, I led distributed teams across different timezones, reinforcing the application of Agile methodologies. During my tenure, which spanned just over a year, I served as a Scrum Master for three teams, providing guidance and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

Key Responsibilities:

Agile Coaching: Guided teams in their Agile journey, promoting practices that enhance efficiency and collaboration.
Scrum Master: Acted as Scrum Master for three teams, overseeing project deliverables and ensuring adherence to Scrum principles.
Cross-Timezone Team Management: Led distributed teams across different timezones, ensuring effective communication and coordination despite geographical and time differences.
Achievements:

Successfully served as Scrum Master for three teams, ensuring the successful delivery of projects following Agile methodologies.
Managed distributed teams effectively, fostering a culture of collaboration and communication across different timezones.
While at K3 Business Technology, I navigated a significant shift as the company decided to transition from Agile to a waterfall methodology based on their business requirements. Despite this change, my tenure at K3 Business Technology broadened my experience in managing distributed teams and navigating methodological changes.
profile_positions.title: Agile Coach

profile_positions.description:
At Cognizant, I held the position of Senior Manager, leading Agile transformations for clients in diverse industries. I first served as a Scrum Master for a large telecom company in the Netherlands, managing the transition from a waterfall to an Agile way of working. In my next project, I served as an Agile Coach for a large Banking and Financial Services client, setting up effective distributed agile squads, POCLACs, and Obeyas, and guiding them through Start-up, Speed-up, and Sustain phases towards maturity.

Key Responsibilities:

Scrum Master: Initiated the Agile transformation for a large telecom client, leading the shift from waterfall to Agile methodologies, ensuring a smooth transition and fostering Agile practices.
Agile Coach: Worked closely with a major BFS client, facilitating the setup of distributed agile squads, POCLACs, and Obeyas. Guided the teams through Start-up, Speed-up, and Sustain phases towards maturity.
Cultural Mediator: Bridged the cultural gaps between teams in different countries, facilitating effective communication and collaboration.
Conflict Resolution: Acted as a natural conflict resolution facilitator, addressing issues promptly and effectively to maintain team harmony and productivity.
Achievements:

Successfully led the Agile transformation for a large telecom client, transitioning the project from waterfall to Agile methodologies.
As an Agile Coach, set up effective distributed agile squads, POCLACs, and Obeyas, guiding them towards maturity.
Recognized for my ability to bridge cultural gaps and resolve conflicts, contributing to better team collaboration and project outcomes.
My experience at Cognizant allowed me to apply my Agile expertise in diverse contexts, further strengthening my skills as a Scrum Master and Agile Coach
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
Serving as an Agile Delivery Manager and Scrum Master at HolidayMe, I led multiple teams to successful project deliveries using Scrum methodologies. In addition, I leveraged my expertise as an Agile Coach to mentor a team of 60 individuals on Scrum practices, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and collaboration.

Key Responsibilities:

Scrum Master: Guided multiple teams in their application of Scrum methodologies, ensuring effective and efficient project delivery.
Agile Coaching: Mentored a team of 60, instilling a thorough understanding of Scrum principles and practices and fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
Agile Delivery Management: Ensured timely and high-quality project deliveries by effectively applying Agile and Scrum methodologies.
Achievements:

Successfully managed and delivered numerous projects for HolidayMe.com, demonstrating the effectiveness of Scrum methodologies in project management.
As an Agile Coach, enhanced team productivity and efficiency by imparting a strong understanding of Scrum principles and practices.
My tenure at HolidayMe allowed me to further refine my skills as an Agile Delivery Manager, Scrum Master, and Agile Coach. This role underscored the importance of Agile principles and their value in efficient project delivery.
profile_positions.title: Software Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description:
During my tenure at Citrus Payments, a dynamic startup, I expanded my expertise in Agile Project Management and Scrum Mastery within a fast-paced and innovative environment. Although my time at the company was brief, lasting just 8 months, the experience provided valuable insights into the unique challenges and opportunities of working in a startup culture.

Key Responsibilities:

Scrum Master: Acted as Scrum Master for multiple teams, guiding them in their Agile journey and helping them overcome obstacles.
Release Management: Oversaw the release management process, ensuring timely and successful deployment of software updates and new features.
Agile Project Management: Managed over 20 concurrent projects, applying Agile methodologies to deliver results on time and within scope.
Achievements:

Successfully managed numerous concurrent projects, maintaining high standards of quality and efficiency in a fast-paced startup environment.
Improved release management processes, resulting in more consistent and reliable software updates for users.
My experience at Citrus Payments allowed me to gain firsthand knowledge of startup culture and the importance of agility and adaptability in such settings. This opportunity contributed significantly to my professional growth, preparing me for future challenges and opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.company: Springer Nature Technology and Publishing Solutions
profile_positions.description:
Transitioning to Crest Premedia, I took on a role as Project Manager, which marked the beginning of my journey in Agile Project Management. I served as a Scrum Master for a yearlong project, honed my skills in developing project plans, reports, and requirement documentation, and managed collaborations across multiple locations.

Key Responsibilities:

Agile Project Management: Successfully managed a yearlong project using Agile methodologies, serving as a Scrum Master to guide the team and ensure project goals were met.
Document Creation: Developed comprehensive project plans, reports, and requirement documentation to keep stakeholders informed and ensure alignment across the project team.
Multi-Location Collaboration: Coordinated and managed collaborations across various locations, including the UK, Pune, Bangalore, and the Philippines.
Client Interaction: Conducted daily interactions with clients, providing project updates, addressing concerns, and strengthening relationships.
Training: Prepared and delivered end-user training, ensuring smooth adoption of the project outcomes.
Achievements:

Managed and successfully delivered a yearlong Agile project, meeting key performance metrics and client expectations.
Fostered strong relationships with clients and stakeholders across multiple locations, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.
My role at Crest Premedia was a significant stepping stone in my career, introducing me to Agile Project Management and enhancing my skills in multi-location collaboration and client interaction.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
In my role as Project Manager at Almana General Hospitals, I was responsible for managing the implementation and configuration of the Hospital Information System and SAGE ACCPAC ERP system. My work in Saudi Arabia provided me with valuable experience in managing large-scale projects within the healthcare domain and working closely with diverse stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities:

Project Management: Successfully led the implementation and configuration of the Hospital Information System and SAGE ACCPAC ERP system, ensuring timely completion and alignment with stakeholder requirements.
Module Implementation: Actively involved in the implementation and configuration of various modules, including Accounts Payable (A/P), Accounts Receivable (A/R), General Ledger (G/L), Fixed Assets (F/A), Inventory Control (I/C), Purchase Workflow (P/W), and User Configuration and Management.
Stakeholder Engagement: Worked closely with stakeholders and end-users, gathering requirements, providing progress updates, and addressing concerns throughout the project lifecycle.
Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborated with multiple departments and teams to ensure the seamless integration of systems and the successful completion of projects.
Achievements:

Effectively managed and delivered multiple projects, contributing to the improved efficiency of hospital operations and financial management.
Built strong working relationships with stakeholders and end-users, ensuring their needs and expectations were met throughout the project.
My time at Almana General Hospitals allowed me to broaden my project management experience within the healthcare industry, enhancing my understanding of the unique challenges and opportunities in this sector.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Stepping into a new phase of my career at Benchmark IT Solutions, I transitioned from a programming role to a Project Coordinator. This pivotal role allowed me to broaden my skillset, focusing on client communication, project information management, and the realization of the importance of practical mockups over extensive documentation.

Key Responsibilities:

Client Communication: Served as the key point of contact for clients, facilitating the collection and dissemination of project-related information.
Project Coordination: Oversaw various aspects of project planning and execution, ensuring alignment with client expectations and timelines.
Mockup Development: Advocated for and implemented the use of working mockups as a more practical and effective alternative to comprehensive documentation, enhancing client engagement and feedback.
Cross-functional Collaboration: Worked in close coordination with different teams to ensure seamless execution and delivery of projects.
Achievements:

Successfully coordinated multiple projects, ensuring effective communication and timely delivery.
Pioneered the shift from extensive documentation to working mockups, leading to improved client feedback and project outcomes.
My role as a Project Coordinator at Benchmark IT Solutions was a turning point in my career, providing me with invaluable project management experience and insights. The lessons I learned during this period have had a profound influence on my subsequent professional journey.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
At Brainvisa, I stepped into a Senior Programmer Analyst role where I was instrumental in the development of e-learning platform software. Our team created innovative solutions that transformed MS Word storyboards into SCORM-compliant courses, capable of running on any Learning Management System (LMS) through a flash player.

Key Responsibilities:

Software Development for E-Learning: Worked on the full life cycle of software development, focusing on creating robust and user-friendly e-learning platforms.
Storyboard Parsing: Developed features to parse storyboards in MS Word, allowing for the seamless transformation of content into interactive learning courses.
SCORM Compliance: Ensured that the courses were SCORM-compliant, allowing for their universal compatibility and accessibility across various LMS platforms.
Collaboration & Problem Solving: Worked closely with team members and stakeholders to understand requirements, solve complex technical challenges, and deliver effective solutions.
Achievements:

Successfully developed and implemented software that has facilitated the creation of numerous interactive, SCORM-compliant e-learning courses.
Streamlined the process of transforming MS Word storyboards into interactive courses, improving efficiency and user experience.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
As an early-career freelance software developer, I was responsible for the end-to-end software development process, working closely with clients to transform their ideas into robust and functional software solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

- Client Requirement Gathering: Collaborated with clients to understand their software needs, translating them into detailed requirements and project specifications.
- Software Design & Development: Employed the Waterfall model to design, develop, and test software solutions, ensuring adherence to client specifications and industry standards.
- Quality Assurance & Testing: Conducted thorough testing and debugging to guarantee the reliability and performance of the developed software.
- Project Delivery & Support: Delivered completed projects to clients, providing ongoing support and maintenance to ensure customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Sofware Developer
